column3: ## Upload an XML file which does not meet the DOAJ schema
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

Select "Choose file" and select a file from your computer which is XML but not of the DOAJ schema. You may use the file "schema_invalid.xml" from the DOAJ folder in resources for this test.

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/3384_article_xml_test_resources/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/DOAJ/schema_invalid.xml
Choose "DOAJ Native XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown

column4: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating an error has occurred

Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes" (you may need to reload the page). Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.
